data.name: Sunny Grove
data.detailed_description:
A panda parent in a colorful adventure!

Your babies are going through a rebellious phase and like to hide from their parents. They are too young to realize the dangers of the forest. As a parent it is your task to get them home before they get hurt (and before dinner!).

Collect food, avoid alligators and navigate through obstacles to complete the objectives of each mission. Find your young, have them follow you and bring them home to the den to keep them safe. You can play alone or with a co-parent to work together to complete the objectives!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 780
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
